document_data.name: Bordjias
document_data.Relationships: The Bordjias were known allies of the [[Qahtani]] tribe of [[El Ma'ra]].
document_data.History: The sheikh of the Bordjias had 10 of his [[camel]]s stolen by a [[Kadumi|young warrior]] of the Qahtani tribe in the {{yearlinkName|1360}}. Only a few Bordjias warriors were slain in the raid, a number not likely to cause strife between the two tribes.
